column4: is it possible to have ubuntu 64 bit version installed in a virtual machine which is installed on a 32 bit win XP version ?
is it possible to have ubuntu 64 bit version installed in a vmware (a virtual machine) which is installed on a 32 bit win XP version ?
no, well, if you can, it won't help any, if the host OS is 32 bit, there is no way you'll be able to send 64 bit instructions to the processor
